data.professional_summary: Having 9.5 Years of IT Industry Experience. Hands on Experience in C#, ASP.Net, MVC5, Web API, WCF, Web Services, Azure, .Net Core 6.0, Java Script, Jquery, Angular16, React.js, Redux, .NET( framework4.0,4.5,4.7), Ado.Net, Entity Framework Linq, SQL Server 2008, SQL Server 2012, SQL Server 2014, PostgreSQL, GIT, SVN, TFS, SignalR, RabbitMQ, Kafka, Google Map API, Payment Get-way, SQL-Query, Stored Procedure, Triggers, CTE, SQL Transaction. Good Knowledge in Bootstrap Framework, HTML, CSS, Microsoft Azure, Microservices. Having good exposure on building and deployment phase of the application. Ability to translate business requirement into conceptual solutions. Good client-interfacing Skills. Strong analytical abilities, good leadership qualities, good team management interpersonal skills and communication skills.
